headline: Tesla Recasts Future Around Optimus Robots AI And Rich Valuation
summary: Tesla (NasdaqGS:TSLA) is winding down production of its Model S and Model X vehicles to convert facilities for large scale Optimus humanoid robot manufacturing. The company is publicly repositioning itself from a primarily electric vehicle maker to an AI and robotics focused business. Speculation continues around a possible combination of Tesla, SpaceX, and xAI, which could reshape how these businesses operate and are funded. For investors, this shift reframes Tesla from an auto...

headline: Elon Musk Warns US Will '1,000%' Go Bankrupt Over Soaring Debt, Says 'Interest Payments On National Debt Exceed Military Budget'
summary: On Friday Tesla (NASDAQ:TSLA) CEO Elon Musk issued a stark warning regarding the U.S. national debt, stating that America is on a path to bankruptcy. Musk emphasized the necessity of advancements in artificial intelligence and robotics to avert this financial crisis. In a recent podcast appearance, Musk declared, "We are 1,000% going to go bankrupt as a country and fail as a country, without AI and robots. The national debt is piling up like crazy." headline: India-US trade deal gives tariff-free access to Harley bikes, no reprieve for Tesla

headline: Should Tesla’s AI and Robotaxis Pivot After Weaker 2025 Results Require Action From Tesla (TSLA) Investors?
summary: Tesla recently reported weaker 2025 results, with full-year revenue of US$94,827 million and net income of US$3,794 million, while accelerating a shift away from legacy models toward robotaxis, humanoid robots and large-scale US solar manufacturing. At the same time, Elon Musk’s broader empire is being reshaped through the SpaceX–xAI merger and early discussions about a possible tie-up with Tesla, raising questions about how intertwined AI, space infrastructure and energy could redefine...
